subject: A couple articles about the Ovilus
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
For those of you interested in reading articles about the Ovilus, here 
are a couple recently written by the same guy.  The first is his 
original and the second, a follow-up to the first.  I don't think he 
likes the Ovilus too much.

http://sonoranparanormalinvestigations.org/blog1/archives/294

http://sonoranparanormalinvestigations.org/blog1/archives/377

I didn't see these linked on Mr Chappell's website, even though he has 
links to good and bad articles about his products.  Maybe he could add 
these once he sees this post...???

- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
